# only frontend needs to be stateful (event lost while the daemon # was down will be replayed when it is back up) # all other nodes if they lose it is ok so no need to snapshot mkdir -p /var/opt/rocks/serf/
private_ip=`rocks list host interface &hostname; output-col=subnet,iface,ip | \ awk '{if ($1 == "private" && $2 !~ /vlan[0-9]*/ && $4 ~ /-*/) {print $3}}'`
{ "rejoin_after_leave": true, "bind": "$private_ip", "retry_join": ["&Kickstart_PrivateHostname;"] }
#!/bin/bash #
# we need to wait for the shared.key while [ ! -f /etc/411-security/shared.key ] ; do sleep 2 done
# setup encryption key to talk to the other agent in the cluster encryption=`cat /etc/411-security/shared.key |grep -v BEGIN |grep -v END | base64 -d |dd bs=1 count=16 |base64`
echo -e "{\n \"encrypt_key\": \"$encryption\"\n}" > /etc/serf/encryptionkey.json chmod 0600 /etc/serf/encryptionkey.json
/etc/init.d/rocks-serf start chkconfig rocks-serf on
rm -rf /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-04-serf-setup
